simplefps.config.title: SimpleFPS Configuration
simplefps.config.enabled.tooltip: Toggle the FPS counter on or off. (Default: ON)
simplefps.config.textOpacity.tooltip: Adjust the visibility/opacity of the FPS text (0-100%). (Default: 100)
simplefps.config.textColor.tooltip: Set the text color using a hex code (e.g., #FFFFFF for white). (Default: #FFFFFF)
simplefps.config.textSize.tooltip: Adjust the size of the FPS text (50-400%). (Default: 100)
simplefps.config.positionX.tooltip: Horizontal position of the FPS counter on screen. Range: 0-3840. (Default: 5)
simplefps.config.positionY.tooltip: Vertical position of the FPS counter on screen. Range: 0-2160. (Default: 5)
simplefps.config.showLabel.tooltip: Display 'FPS' text after the number. (Default: ON)
simplefps.config.showDirection.tooltip: Display facing direction (N/E/S/W) after FPS. (Default: OFF)
simplefps.config.backgroundColor.tooltip: Set background color using hex code (e.g., #000000 for black). (Default: #000000)
simplefps.config.backgroundOpacity.toolt: Adjust the opacity of the background (0-100%). (Default: 50)
simplefps.config.showBackground.tooltip: Display a background behind the FPS text. (Default: ON)
simplefps.config.adaptiveColor.tooltip: Color text based on FPS: Red (low), Yellow (medium), Green (high). Overrides custom text color. (Default: OFF)
simplefps.config.lowFpsThreshold.tooltip: FPS at or below this value will be shown in Red. Range: 1-999. (Default: 30)
simplefps.config.highFpsThreshold.toolti: FPS at or above this value will be shown in Green. Between thresholds shows Yellow. Range: 1-999. (Default: 60)
simplefps.config.graphEnabled.tooltip: Show a visual graph of FPS history with Min/Max/Avg stats. (Default: OFF)
simplefps.config.graphScale.tooltip: Adjust the size of the FPS graph (50-200%). (Default: 100)
simplefps.config.graphX.tooltip: Horizontal position of the FPS graph on screen. Range: 0-3840. (Default: 5)
simplefps.config.graphY.tooltip: Vertical position of the FPS graph on screen. Range: 0-2160. (Default: 100)
simplefps.config.coordinatesEnabled.tool: Show X/Y/Z coordinates on screen. (Default: OFF)
simplefps.config.coordinatesX.tooltip: Horizontal position of coordinates on screen. Range: 0-3840. (Default: 5)
simplefps.config.coordinatesY.tooltip: Vertical position of coordinates on screen. Range: 0-2160. (Default: 50)
simplefps.config.biomeEnabled.tooltip: Show current biome name on screen. (Default: OFF)
simplefps.config.biomeX.tooltip: Horizontal position of biome on screen. Range: 0-3840. (Default: 5)
simplefps.config.biomeY.tooltip: Vertical position of biome on screen. Range: 0-2160. (Default: 70)
